test-method.name: loginWithSeleniumAndGetCookie
test-method.description: 1. Login to the application using Selenium WebDriver 2. Extract the cookie named 'orangehrm' after successful login 3. Store the cookie value for subsequent API requests

test-method.name: GetLogin
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/auth/login' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not pass any request body (null) 3. Print and verify the response status code and response body 4. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK) and response is HTML page

test-method.name: GetEmpActionSummary
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/dashboard/employees/action-summary' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not include any request body (null) 3. Print the response status code and response body 4. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: GetDashboardShortcut
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/dashboard/shortcuts' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not provide any request body (null) 3. Print the response status code and body for verification 4. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: GetEmpLeaveInfo
test-method.description: 1. Generate the current date dynamically in 'yyyy-MM-dd' format 2. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/dashboard/employees/leaves?date={current_date}' endpoint with a valid cookie 3. Do not include any request body (null) 4. Log the date used, response status code, and response body 5. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: GetEmpSubunit
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/dashboard/employees/subunit' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not provide any request body (null) 3. Print the response status code and response body for validation 4. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: GetEmployeeLocations
test-method.description: 1. Construct the endpoint '/web/index.php/api/v2/dashboard/employees/locations' 2. Send a GET request with a valid cookie 3. Print the response status code and body for verification 4. Assert response code is 200 and all required fields are present

test-method.name: GetAdminUsers
test-method.description: 1. Construct the endpoint '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/users?limit=50&offset=0&sortField=u.userName&sortOrder=ASC' 2. Send a GET request with a valid cookie 3. Print the response status code and body for verification 4. Assert response code is 200 and required fields are present 5. Validate user list content and structure

test-method.name: GetJobTitlesTest
test-method.description: 1. Construct the endpoint '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/job-titles?limit=50&offset=0&sortField=jt.jobTitleName&sortOrder=ASC' 2. Send a GET request with a valid cookie 3. Print the response status code and body for verification 4. Assert response code is 200 and required fields are present and non-empty

test-method.name: DeleteJobTitleByIdTest
test-method.description: 1. Fetch job title ID using GET '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/job-titles' also add a new job title before deleting 2. Delete that job title using DELETE '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/job-titles' 3. Assert response code is 200 and first job title is different after deletion

test-method.name: GetPaygrades
test-method.description: Precondition: Null 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/pay-grades?limit=50&offset=0' endpoint with a valid cookie and the request body 2. Print the request body, response status code, and response body for debugging 3. Assert that the response status code is 200, indicating the request was successful

test-method.name: PutPaygrades
test-method.description: Precondition: Get the id of the Paygrade 1. Get the paygrade id and generate a URL '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/pay-grades/{id}' 2. Send a PUT request to the endpoint with a valid cookie and the request body 3. Print the request body, response status code, and response body for debugging 4. Assert that the response status code is 200, indicating the request was successful

test-method.name: PostEmpStatuses
test-method.description: Precondition: Null 1. Generate a unique name 2. Send POST request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/employment-statuse' 3. Make sure the request contains the req body,cookie4. Verify response contains the added name

test-method.name: PutEmploymentStatusTest
test-method.description: 1. Fetch employment status ID using GET '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/employment-statuses' 2. Construct endpoint '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/employment-statuses/{id}' 3. Send a PUT request with a valid cookie and body containing a new name 4. Print request/response details 5. Assert response code is 200 and updated name is reflected in the response

test-method.name: DeleteEmploymentStatusByIdTest
test-method.description: 1. Fetch employment status ID using GET '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/employment-statuses' 2. Delete that employment status using DELETE '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/employment-statuses' 3. Assert response code is 200 and verify that the first employment status ID has changed

test-method.name: PostJobCategoriesTest
test-method.description: 1. Generate a unique job category name 2. Send POST request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/job-categories' 3. Assert response status is 200 4. Validate that the response contains the added job category name
